description._content: Returns a list of hot tags for the given period.

response._content:
<hottags period="day" count="6">
	<tag score="20">northerncalifornia</tag>
	<tag score="18">top20</tag>
	<tag score="15">keychain</tag>

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: period
argument._content: The period for which to fetch hot tags. Valid values are day and week (defaults to day).

argument.name: count
argument._content: The number of tags to return. Defaults to 20. Maximum allowed value is 200.
